SA11sanss14u:120_0: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /

SA11sanss14u:139_0: vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalâbhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:144_0: tatêyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati /
SA11sanss14u:145_0: sa mahārāja tāvan mahān abdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati /

SA11sanss14u:147_0: saṃvartamāne khalu punar loke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /

SA11sanss14u:196_0: yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena câbhyavaharati yatra câvatiṣṭhate /

SA11sanss14u:204_0: bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati /
SA11sanss14u:209_0: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣôtthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet /

SA11sanss14u:214_0: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet /
SA11sanss14u:215_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti /

SA11sanss14u:233_0: yāvad iti hi mahārāja yā kācid varṇasaṃsthānaprativijñaptir ayam ucyate cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss14u:235_0: iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyâdhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayârambaṇā viṣayavijñaptir ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss14u:236_0: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nêndriyaniśrito na viṣayebhyâgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nâdhyātma bahirdhā nôbhayam antareṇa /
SA11sanss14u:237_0: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:238_0: sôtpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanss14u:239_0: tasya khalu punar vijñānadhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:242_0: iti mahārāja vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nôpalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanss14u:243_0: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:247_0: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat /
SA11sanss14u:248_0: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nâbdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:250_0: na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmâyatanaṃ vâyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:251_0: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyâyatanaṃ vâyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:255_0: niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā /
SA11sanss14u:256_0: iti hi mahārājâikâikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nôpalabhate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanss14u:262_0: kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā /
SA11sanss14u:265_0: iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvântato nôpalabhyate //
SA11sanss14u:267_0: anāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ côpādāya sthānam apy asya nôpalabhyate svabhāvavirahitatvāt /
SA11sanss14u:278_0: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣâbhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatâkāśadhātuparyavasānâprāptikā avyavahārânabhilāpyânabhilapanīyāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:279_0: yatra mahārājêndriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayêty ucyante /

SA11sanss14u:284_0: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatîti /
SA11sanss14u:293_0: yad etan mahārāja mano 'pratikūleṣu rūpeṣv anunītaṃ carati /
SA11sanss14u:300_0: evaṃ śabdâdiṣv api trividham ārambaṇam anubhavati pūrvavat //
SA11sanss14u:303_0: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyā-
SA11sanss14u:307_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī strī /
SA11sanss14u:311_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanss14u:317_0: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nôpalabhyate /
SA11sanss14u:319_0: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanss14u:322_0: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśet /
SA11sanss14u:325_0: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā /
SA11sanss14u:326_0: tac ca karmâbhisaṃskṛtam āditâiva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanss14u:327_0: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nôttarāṃ nôrdhvaṃ nâdho nânuvidiśaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:331_0: jīvitêndriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc carama-

SA11sanss14u:335_0: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenâdhipatinā tena ca karmaṇârambaṇenâupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanss14u:336_0: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vâsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu /
SA11sanss14u:337_0: tasya ca prathamavijñānasyâupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyânantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /

SA11sanss14u:343_0: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanss14u:345_0: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanss14u:348_0: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanss14u:357_0: karmaṇāṃ câbandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na câtra kaścit kartā na bhoktânyatra nāmasaṃketāt /
SA11sanss14u:359_0: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet /
SA11sanss14u:362_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnântare śatruḥ /
SA11sanss14u:367_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanss14u:373_0: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:374_0: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanss14u:376_0: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate /
SA11sanss14u:381_0: suptaḥ svapnântare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate /
SA11sanss14u:382_0: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret /
SA11sanss14u:383_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā /
SA11sanss14u:384_0: yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvôpekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ karmâbhisaṃskarotîti pūrvavat /
SA11sanss14u:385_0: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt /
SA11sanss14u:387_0: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret /
SA11sanss14u:388_0: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanss14u:393_0: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nôpalabhyate /
SA11sanss14u:400_0: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
SA11sanss14u:404_0: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:409_0: mukto mocayeyam āśvastâśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
SA11sanss14u:410_0: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate 'iśvaryâdhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
SA11sanss14u:414_1: /atrânantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛtâivaṃ paṭhyate /
SA11sanss14u:415_0: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
SA11sanss14u:418_0: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam anantayaśasaṃ tathâvasīdantaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:424_0: mahārājânantayaśāś caturdvīpeṣu rājyâiśvaryaṃ kārayitvâbandhyamanorathatām anubhūya sarvadrumâkālaphalatāṃ sarvôpadravaprasrabdhisarvasatvâbandhyamanorathatāṃ gandhôdakavarṣaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvôpakaraṇavarṣaṃ cânubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā śakrasyârdhâsanam ākramyātîcchayā na mukto 'tṛptâiva kāmaiḥ kālagatêti /
SA11sanss14u:425_0: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryêty evam uktvā ca rājânantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt /
SA11sanss14u:429_0: smāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyate /
SA11sanss14u:430_0: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyatae ity ādi /
SA11sanss14u:434_0: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:439_0: anājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nâlābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nâyaśaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:453_0: katamâiṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanss14u:454_0: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanâho śvit saṃjñôtâho saṃskārâtha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
SA11sanss14u:456_0: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanss14u:462_0: tad evam anupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:466_0: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ //
SA11sanss14u:473_0: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir anantakoṭir anāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi //
SA11sanss14u:478_0: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcânantaryāṇi /
SA11sanss14u:480_0: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:487_0: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nôpalabhāmahe /
SA11sanss14u:490_0: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
SA11sanss14u:491_0: koṭim api sa tasyôpalabhate dvaye câsau caratîti //
SA11sanss14u:493_0: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhâbhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:494_0: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathâiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:496_0: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:497_0: na ca vacana câsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti //
SA11sanss14u:498_0: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na câsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:499_0: tathêmi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:501_0: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:502_0: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:502_1: /yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
SA11sanss14u:503_0: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:504_0: yatha naru ihêndrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
SA11sanss14u:505_0: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:505_1: /puravara yathâṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
SA11sanss14u:506_0: yatha nagara tathâṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:507_0: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
SA11sanss14u:508_0: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:512_0: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nâpi snehadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss14u:513_0: vimṛśatu bherîva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:513_1: /hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
SA11sanss14u:516_0: tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:517_0: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nâpi sa svatantraḥ /
SA11sanss14u:518_0: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:521_0: satvaś câsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
SA11sanss14u:523_0: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjâriham //
SA11sanss14u:524_0: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [[DOUBT]] daśaddiśigataṃ nâivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
SA11sanss14u:526_0: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devâtideva tvayā /
SA11sanss14u:527_0: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
SA11sanss14u:528_0: tena tvāṃ dvipadôttamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjâriham //
SA11sanss14u:529_0: satvānâiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyâpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:530_0: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair nôditāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:532_0: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ //
SA11sanss14u:534_0: nâivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā nâiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ //
SA11sanss14u:535_0: uktaṃ cô sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:536_0: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ //
SA11sanss14u:537_0: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
SA11sanss14u:539_0: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate //
SA11sanss14u:540_0: śamathaś câtha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
SA11sanss14u:541_0: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:545_0: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:546_0: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa nôtpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanss14u:548_0: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nôpalabhyate na tac cakṣur nêndriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:550_0: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ nô tu khalu paramâ-
SA11sanss14u:553_0: evaṃ cakṣuś cêndriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālôpalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram /
SA11sanss14u:557_0: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:559_0: atrâiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
SA11sanss14u:562_0: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenâsya vyākaraṇam //
SA11sanss14u:569_0: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibi-
SA11sanss14u:573_0: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumâṅgaśo vicārayasi /
SA11sanss14u:576_0: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:577_0: śakaṭâṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya câiva kriyāṃ //
SA11sanss14u:578_0: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
SA11sanss14u:579_0: vātêritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ //
SA11sanss14u:580_0: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutâśanaṃ ca yajane /
SA11sanss14u:581_0: na nivartate vahnis tathâiva karmasya kartāraḥ //
SA11sanss14u:582_0: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
SA11sanss14u:585_0: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
SA11sanss14u:589_0: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharmôtpadyate utânutpannaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:597_0: sā ca śūnyatā nôtpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanss14u:599_0: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyôktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā nôtpatsyante na nirotsyante /
SA11sanss14u:602_0: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathâbhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā nôtpadyante na nirudhyante /
SA11sanss14u:605_0: saṃskṛtā dharmôtpadyante nirudhyante cêty asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:608_0: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyôttrāsapadaparihārârthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante cêti /
SA11sanss14u:609_0: na câtra kasyacid dharmasyôtpādo na nirodhêti //
SA11sanss14u:611_0: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
SA11sanss14u:619_0: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
SA11sanss14u:621_0: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ parasparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
SA11sanss14u:627_0: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti nâite kasyacit /
SA11sanss14u:629_0: nâite bhagavan dharmôdvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
SA11sanss14u:630_0: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
SA11sanss14u:633_0: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmîti /
SA11sanss14u:635_0: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss14u:637_0: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
SA11sanss14u:638_0: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratîti /
SA11sanss14u:644_0: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti //
SA11sanss14u:648_0: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramârthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
SA11sanss14u:660_0: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmêti /
SA11sanss14u:671_0: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
SA11sanss14u:672_0: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti //
SA11sanss14u:673_0: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:674_0: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
SA11sanss14u:676_0: nâsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nâsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam eva paśyatîty ādi /
SA11sanss14u:680_0: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrâvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra
SA11sanss14u:684_0: sā câitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmâvajñā câivaṃ bhāvanīyā //
SA11sanss14u:685_0: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā /
SA11sanss14u:686_0: ekasya hi parâtmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ //
SA11sanss14u:687_0: vinâlambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:692_0: na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihâpi janadurbhagāt //
SA11sanss14u:698_0: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautîti na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:699_0: paraḥ kila mayi prītêty ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ //
SA11sanss14u:700_0: tattuṣṭyâiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadā astu sā /
SA11sanss14u:701_0: tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama //
SA11sanss14u:702_0: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11sanss14u:703_0: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihâṇv api //
SA11sanss14u:706_0: na dharmo nâyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanâdibhiḥ /
SA11sanss14u:721_0: haren muniḥ // sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate /
SA11sanss14u:722_0: tad evêdam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt //
SA11sanss14u:723_0: avastu câitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati /
SA11sanss14u:724_0: ahaṃ câitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati /
